title: The SRA shall adopt the procedure laid down in the M
clause_text: The SRA shall adopt the procedure laid down in the M.R. & T.P. Act, 1966 for giving building permission to any Slum Rehabilitation Project under this Scheme.
section: Building Permission for Slum Rehabilitation Project

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
